version_description: Commanders, we have addressed a number of reported issues to improve your experience.  See you on the battlefield!
Commanders, we’ve made several fixes to your game, as requested by the community. Update now for the best experience and thanks for playing!
Hey, Commanders! In this update, we’ve addressed reported issues to improve your battle experience. Thanks for playing.
Greetings, players! As part of this update, we’ve fixed some behind-the-battleground issues that may have affected your game. Thanks for playing.

Hey, Commanders! In this update you’ll find:

•Time-limited Rivals Champions events
•A new Player Level: Play the game and earn XP to consistently increase your level (vs. leveling based on medals)
•Unit and map balance changes, plus fixes to improve gameplay
•Unified training costs across Common, Rare, and Epic units
•A reward system with adjusted Credits earned from bounties, victories, and Alliance donations

These changes were made based on feedback from the community, so keep it coming! And, thanks for playing.

These changes were made based on feedback from the community, so keep it coming! And, thanks for playing.
Hey, Commanders! In this update, we’ve addressed reported issues to improve your battle experience. Thanks for playing.

Welcome to global launch, Commanders! During pre-launch, we gathered community feedback to make changes and add features you care about. In this update, you’ll find:
•Rivals Champions events – a new way to measure your skills
•An updated Player Level system where you earn XP to increase your level (vs. leveling based on medals)
•Two fresh units – Nod’s Widowmaker and GDI’s War Dogs
•Unit and map balance changes, plus fixes to improve gameplay
•Unified training costs across Common, Rare, and Epic units
•A reward system with adjusted Credits earned from bounties, victories, and Alliance donations
Thanks for playing, and please keep the feedback coming!

Thanks for playing, and please keep the feedback coming!

Commander, get ready for an exciting update that enhances the competitive experience with:
•New Spectator Mode – watch replays with full deck loadouts and more
•Custom Matches – create matches to play against friends or run your own tournament
•New Unit, the Nod Laser Drone
•Full Season Reset – climb the leaderboard again and earn more Rewards
•An updated Command Bar, making it easier to see which enemies your unit is strong against
•Unit and map balance changes
Thanks for playing!

Commander, get ready for Vanity items and exciting events with this update, including:
•New and improved Events: War Games, Credit Blitz, Unit Blitz, Rivals Champions
•The ability to customize your army with unit skins, emotes, and explojis
•Introducing XP and Credit Boosts, making your games more efficient
•Visual improvements to the landing page
•Performance improvements
Thanks for playing and please share your feedback!

Hey, Commander! Prepare for an exciting update, including:
•New Cloning Lab Feature – battle to earn cards for the units you want
•Fresh Unit, Nod Centurion
•Rewards that reset when you replay events
•Five new Bounties when you refresh those you’ve completed
•Increased XP for reaching Platinum III and above
•Purchasable player levels that accelerate your progress
•Map and performance improvements
Thanks for playing. Please share your feedback!

Commander, it’s time for another exciting update, where you’ll find:
•New Unit: Nod Scavenger
•Rivals Race: Race against similarly skilled players to finish in first place and earn rewards
•Added Commander Skins – customize your army
•Cloning Chambers: Complete within a set time, with battles played reducing the time
•The reward for completing five bounties is now Credits
•Unit balance changes
•Performance improvements
Thanks for playing, and please share your feedback with us!

Commander, get ready for new game modes and daily rewards in this update, where you can:
•Experience C&C: Rivals in a different way with special, time-limited new modes using unique rules
•Log in daily to earn rewards through the Seasonal Login Calendar
•Practice against A.I. opponents
We’ve also made some overall performance improvements. Thanks for playing, and please share your feedback!
